mapper.sql: id, user_id, type, input, response, timestamp, group_id
mapper.select: SELECT t1.group_id as id, t1.group_id as groupId, COALESCE(t2.first_input, '新对话') as title, COALESCE(t3.last_message, '点击查看详情') as lastMessage, t1.last_timestamp as timestamp FROM ( SELECT group_id, MAX(timestamp) as last_timestamp FROM ai_chat_logs WHERE user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND group_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY group_id ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT group_id, input as first_input FROM ai_chat_logs WHERE user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND group_id IS NOT NULL AND input IS NOT NULL AND (group_id, timestamp) IN ( SELECT group_id, MIN(timestamp) FROM ai_chat_logs WHERE user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND group_id IS NOT NULL AND input IS NOT NULL GROUP BY group_id ) ) t2 ON t1.group_id = t2.group_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT group_id, COALESCE(input, response) as last_message FROM ai_chat_logs WHERE user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND group_id IS NOT NULL AND (group_id, timestamp) IN ( SELECT group_id, MAX(timestamp) FROM ai_chat_logs WHERE user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND group_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY group_id ) ) t3 ON t1.group_id = t3.group_id ORDER BY t1.last_timestamp DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ai_chat_logs (user_id, type, input, response, timestamp, group_id) VALUES (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{input,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{response,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{timestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
